thread.title: 20 Indian nationals killed by Saudi-led air strikes on Yemen's Hodeidah port | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: 20 Indian nationals killed by Saudi-led air strikes on Yemen's Hodeidah port | Deccan Chronicle

author: Reuters
title: 20 Indian nationals killed by Saudi-led air strikes on Yemen's Hodeidah port | Deccan Chronicle
text:
Reuters | September 08, 2015, 21.21 Two boats were hit in the attack on an area called al-Khokha near Hodeidah port. (Photo: Google maps) Al-Khokha: At least 20 Indian nationals were killed by Saudi-led coalition air strikes on fuel smugglers at Yemen's Hodeidah port on Tuesday, residents and fishermen said.
They said two boats were hit in the attack on an area called al-Khokha near Hodeidah port.
 Yemen Indians killed Middle East Also Read Survivors mourn hundreds killed in Afghan landslide Bahrain: 2 police officers killed, 6 wounded in bomb attack American held in Syria freed after nearly 2 years Huthis install 'Presidential Council' to run Yemen
